bot.startMessage:
Claude Code Telegram Bot

Commands:
/ask <question> - Ask Claude a question
/run <instruction> - Have Claude execute a task
/new - Start a new session (clear context)
/stop - Stop the current task
/dir - View current working directory
/setdir <path> - Set working directory
/status - View status
/usage - View session token usage

Plain messages are also sent to Claude as instructions.
Consecutive messages maintain context automatically. Use /new to reset.

Current working directory: {workDir}
